title: The Crimson Reaper and the Sleeping Princess - Novel Updates
author: Mori   もり
description:
Princess Lilith Freud of the Kingdom of Amaryllis, also knows as the “Beautiful Sleeping Princess of the Freud Family” by the people of her country, is said to have an illness that cause her to sleep for long periods of time.

However, that is a lie, in reality, the Princess Lilith has a mysterious power.

The dreams that Lilith has while sleeping are events from the past, present, or the future!

What is more, those events take place in distant places or even different worlds.

Thanks to her power, in only a few years, the Kingdom was able to grow like no other in their world.

One day, Lilith dreams of a plan that have the Kingdom of Fontae, that is to invade the kingdom of Amaryllis.

The only way to stop this is to form an alliance with the powerful Ayrus Empire, which is famous for its military power.

Now one princess of the Kingdom of Amaryllis have to marry the Prince of the Ayrus Empire, well-known as the “Crimson Reaper”, and it was Lilith who decided to become the bride.

Called the cursed prince from an early age, Gesualdo rejects everybody, also Lilith, who became the crown princess, and treats her coldly.

Therefore, in the land of Ayrus, far away from her home, Lilith can’t just cry!

Thanks to her personality and the knowledge she gains through her dreams, Gesualdo begins to take an interest in her, but he is not the only one!>
